channel.title: Missing Water Texture bug
channel.description:
I am playing on lowest settings in DirectX 81 mode. At the beggining the sludge water texture is missing. It also seems that eye textures are missing, and the hud is just a giant white line.
Heres a screenshots. [url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96628945[/url] [url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96630168[/url] [url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96631113[/url]
And heres my status and getpos. [quote] hostname: Half-Life 2 version : 1.0.1.0/14 4104 insecure map : bm_c0a0c at: 4121 x, -1411 y, -1932 z players : 1 (1 max)
# userid name uniqueid connected ping loss state adr # 3 "Greenleaf" UNKNOWN 07:48 56 0 active loopback ] getpos setpos 4121.890625 -1411.677246 -1932.983398;setang 38.826721 84.279701 0.000000 [/quote]

item.title: Missing Water Texture bug
item.dc:creator: Crystoff
item.description:
I have exactly the same problem. Unfortunately when I go underwater, the missing water texture will cause the whole screen to look like the water on the pictures above, so I’m stuck in the game right now. I would be glad for any help about how to solve this

Read full topic
